description: apt-mark - show, set and unset various settings for a package

global_flags.description: -o and --option can be used multiple times to set different options.

subcommands.name: auto
subcommands.description: apt 2.8.3 (amd64)

subcommands.name: hold
subcommands.description: Mark a package as held back

subcommands.name: minimize-manual
subcommands.description: Mark all dependencies of meta packages as automatically installed.

subcommands.name: showauto
subcommands.description: Print the list of automatically installed packages

subcommands.name: showhold
subcommands.description: Print the list of packages on hold

subcommands.name: showmanual
subcommands.description: Print the list of manually installed packages
